item.title: Data Science Course FREE for Beginners by Azure Cloud Advocates at Microsoft
item.dc:creator: Vugar Ibrahimov
item.description: What is a Data Science Course? Data science is a multidisciplinary field that combines statistics, computer science, and domain knowledge to extract insights from data. Data science can be used for various purposes, such as: Exploring and analyzing data to find patterns, trends, and anomalies. Building and testing predictive models to forecast future outcomes or […]

item.title: Paraphrase Effortlessly with the Powerful Scholarly Paraphrasing AI Tool | GPT-4
item.dc:creator: Vugar Ibrahimov
item.description: How to Paraphrase? Paraphrasing plays a crucial role in academic writing, allowing you to present information in a fresh and unique way. However, crafting a well-written and original piece can often be time-consuming and challenging. Fortunately, there is a new tool available that can help you paraphrase your content quickly and effortlessly. Introducing the Scholarly […]

item.title: PDF AI: Chat with any PDF document Powered | GPT-4 support
item.dc:creator: Vugar Ibrahimov
item.description: What is PDF AI? PDF AI is a technology that uses artificial intelligence to analyze and extract data from PDF documents. It can help students and academic researchers in several ways. For instance, it can help them to quickly search for specific information within a document, extract data from tables, and summarize lengthy texts. PDF […]

item.title: SciSpace: How to Conduct Effective Academic Literature Review 280 mln Articles
item.dc:creator: Vugar Ibrahimov
item.description: What is SciSpace? SciSpace AI is an innovative research assistant that simplifies the process of understanding, searching for, and citing research papers. item.title: Scite AI: Efficiently Find the Best Credible 1.2 billion Academic Citations | GPT-4 support
item.dc:creator: Vugar Ibrahimov
item.description: What is Scite? Scite is an AI-powered platform that helps researchers and students discover and evaluate scientific articles via Smart Citations. Smart Citations allow users to see how a publication has been cited by providing the context of the citation and a classification describing whether it provides supporting or contrasting evidence for the cited […]
